Articles.Content:
Dres is a very small potato. It was the first planet considered to be a dwarf. Its orbit is highly irregular and, together with its size, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a planet. 

Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be trusted by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first **potato** considered to be a dwarf. Its orbit is highly irregular and, together with its size, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a planet. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be trusted by the scientific community.

(I'm using the bold to note which word I changed ^^)

- - - Updated - - -

Oh, apparently we had the same idea ^^'

- - - Updated - - -

There, I changed it ^^

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is highly irregular and, together with its size, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a planet. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be trusted by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its size, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a planet. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be trusted by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its size, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a planet. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be **eaten** by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a planet. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be eaten by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a **foodstuff**. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be eaten by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dwarf planet was officially labeled as Not to be eaten by the scientific community.

EDIT: Ninja'd! ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space. This dramatic planet was officially labeled as Not to be eaten by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of **farms,** this dramatic planet was officially labeled as Not to be eaten by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the **beet** parts of farms. This dramatic planet was officially labeled as Not to be eaten by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic **potato** was officially labeled as not to be eaten by the scientific community.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the scientific refrigerators

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the scientific world.

Dres is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the **agricultural** world.

**Earth** is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.

Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its orbit is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to **recover** since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.

Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato considered to be a potato. Its **shape** is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.

Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously irregular and, together with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.

Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously refridgerated and, together with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was officially labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.

Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously refrigerated and, together with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was **incorrectly** labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.

(Oh god not the refrigerators again, also, what is up with your post count KerbinW365?)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-22T23:15:55Z" title="03/22/2015 11:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 22, 2015</time> by Dres**

Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously **egg-shaped** and, together with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where kindergartners expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.

(No more refrigerators)

Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural world.
